;; source
    (define (zu-parse zu)
      (http-post "textgraph.cgi" (list (cons "text" zu)
                                       (cons "format" "sexp"))))

    (define (zu-eval zu)
      (display (zu-parse zu)))


    (set-handler! (getelem "go") "click"
                  (lambda (e) 
                    (zu-eval (get-content (getelem "source")))))
